channel.title: Dissemination on Pablo's website
channel.description: Recent content in Dissemination on Pablo's website

item.title: Presentation of our work in ICCP 2025
item.description: We presented our work, “Zero-Phase Phasor Fields for Non-Line-of-Sight Imaging” in the International Conference on Computational Photography 2025 held in Toronto.

item.title: European Researchers' Night 2023
item.description: We are back into the European Researchers’ Night!! This time in the Caixa Forum building.

item.title: XII edition of the "JÃ³venes Investigadores/as"
item.description: I presented a poster about our work Zone Plate Virtual Lenses for Memory-Constrained NLOS Imaging.

item.title: European Researchers' Night 2022
item.description: We prepared the activity “Create your own virtual character” to show our work to all ages public.

item.title: Assistance ot ACM SIGGRAPH and poster presentation
item.description: We assisted to the ACM SIGGRAPH 2022 in Vancouver to present the poster Non-Line-of-Sight Transient Rendering
